name: Queen Fight For Survival
description:
We are introducing a beautiful combination of bow and arrow with horse riding.if you are intresting in arrow shooting game then this game is perfect for you.In this Queen Fight For Survival game player has to shoot enemy while on the horse’s back. Horse is running with a fast speed. Main objective of the game is through out enemy from your castle. The target is also an archer. your enemy is not only a static target but also an opponent Arrow shooter on a running horse. player Main challenge is to focus the target on a moving horse and engage him.


Queen Fight For Survival: Features

Realistic Bow arrow controls
Natural Horse track View
Less but Splendid Graphics
Easy Controls
Smooth Game Play
